source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT E.SRC_EMPLOYEE_ID,E.SRC_FIRST_NAME,E.SRC_LAST_NAME,E.SRC_DEPARTMENT_ID,D.DEPARTMENT_NAME,D.MANAGER_ID,D.LOCATION_ID  FROM HR.TGT_EMP_DEPT_DT E
INNER JOIN HR.DEPARTMENTS D
ON E.SRC_DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID

text.value: @concat('update hr.DATALOAD set startdate =  ''',variables('StartDate'),''' ,enddate = ''',utcNow(),''' ,status = ''success'''''',source = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead,''',target = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied,'''  where sourcetable = ''',item().sourcetable,'''')
@concat('update hr.config set status =''failed ''', 'where activeflag = 1 and status is null')

scripts.text: update  hr.config set status = null where activeflag =1

text.value: @concat('update hr.config set startdate =  ''',variables('StartDate'),''' ,enddate = ''',utcNow(),''' ,status = ''success'''''',source = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsRead,''',target = ''',activity('Copy data1').output.rowsCopied,'''  where sourcetable = ''',item().sourcetable,'''')

scriptLines:
query: 'select 
src_Store_Location_ID
,src_Store_Name
,src_Store_Address
,src_Store_Open_Time
,src_Store_Close_Time
,src_State_Name
,tgt_Store_Location_ID
,tgt_Store_Name
,tgt_Store_Address
,tgt_Store_Open_Time
,tgt_Store_Close_Time
,tgt_State_Name
,tgt_FLAG
,Loc_Dim_Key
,DM_CREATE_DATE
,src_md5
,tgt_md5
,case when tgt_Store_Location_ID is NULL or src_md5 <> tgt_md5 then 'Y' end flag_new
,case when tgt_Store_Location_ID is not NULL and src_md5 <> tgt_md5 then 'N' end flag_deactivate
from ( 
select 
A.Store_Location_ID as src_Store_Location_ID,
A.Store_Name as src_Store_Name,
A.Store_Address as src_Store_Address,
A.Store_Open_Time as src_Store_Open_Time,
A.Store_Close_Time as src_Store_Close_Time,
A.State_Name as src_State_Name,
B.Store_Location_ID as tgt_Store_Location_ID,
B.Store_Name as tgt_Store_Name,
B.Store_Address as tgt_Store_Address,
B.Store_Open_Time as tgt_Store_Open_Time,
B.Store_Close_Time as tgt_Store_Close_Time,
B.State_Name as tgt_State_Name,
B.FLAG as tgt_FLAG,
B.Loc_Dim_Key,
cast(getdate() as date) as DM_CREATE_DATE,
HashBytes('MD5',concat(cast(A.Store_Name as varchar),cast(A.Store_Address as varchar),cast(A.Store_Open_Time as varchar),cast(A.Store_Close_Time as varchar),cast(A.State_Name as varchar))) as src_md5,
HashBytes('MD5',concat(cast(B.Store_Name as varchar),cast(B.Store_Address as varchar),cast(B.Store_Open_Time as varchar),cast(B.Store_Close_Time as varchar),cast(B.State_Name as varchar))) as tgt_md5
from HR.locations_dim A 
left Join HR.location_dim1 B on 
A.Store_Location_ID = B.Store_Location_ID
and B.FLAG = 'Y'
)a',

query: 'SELECT PS.[PROMOTION_ID] AS SRC_PROMOTION_ID,
PS.[PROMOTION_NAME] AS  SRC_PROMOTION_NAME, 
PS.[PROMOTION_TYPE] AS SRC_PROMOTION_TYPE,
PS.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] AS SRC_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
PS.[START_DATE] AS SRC_START_DATE,
PS.[END_DATE] AS SRC_END_DATE,
PD.[PROMOTION_ID] AS TGT_PROMOTION_ID,
PD.[PROMOTION_NAME] AS TGT_PROMOTION_NAME,
CASE WHEN PS.[PROMOTION_NAME] <> PD.[PROMOTION_NAME] THEN PD.PROMOTION_NAME ELSE NULL END AS TGT_PREV_PROMOTION_NAME,
PD.[PROMOTION_TYPE] AS TGT_PROMOTION_TYPE,
CASE WHEN PS.[PROMOTION_TYPE] <> PD.[PROMOTION_TYPE] THEN PD.[PROMOTION_TYPE] ELSE NULL END AS TGT_PREV_PROMOTION_TYPE,
PD.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] AS TGT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
CASE WHEN PS.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] <> PD.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] THEN PD.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] ELSE NULL END AS TGT_PREV_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
PD.[START_DATE] AS TGT_START_DATE,
CASE WHEN PS.[START_DATE] <> PD.[START_DATE] THEN PD.[START_DATE] ELSE NULL END AS TGT_PREV_START_DATE,
PD.[END_DATE] AS TGT_END_DATE,
CASE WHEN PS.[END_DATE] <> PD.[END_DATE] THEN PD.[END_DATE] ELSE NULL END AS TGT_PREV_END_DATE,
PD.[STG_CREATE_DATE] AS STG_CREATE_DATE,
CASE WHEN PD.PROMOTION_ID IS NOT NULL AND PS.[PROMOTION_NAME] <> PD.[PROMOTION_NAME] OR
PS.[PROMOTION_TYPE] <> PD.[PROMOTION_TYPE] OR
PS.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] <> PD.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] OR
PS.[START_DATE] <> PD.[START_DATE] OR
PS.[END_DATE] <> PD.[END_DATE] THEN 'UPDATE' 
ELSE 'NOVALUE' 
END AS FLAG_UPDATE,
CASE WHEN PD.PROMOTION_ID IS NULL THEN 'INSERT' 
ELSE 'NOVALUE' 
END AS FLAG_INSERT
FROM [hr].[PROMOTION_STG] AS PS
LEFT JOIN [hr].[PROMOTION_DIM] AS PD
ON PS.[PROMOTION_ID] = PD.[PROMOTION_ID]',

query: 'SELECT PS.[PROMOTION_ID] AS SRC_PROMOTION_ID,PS.[PROMOTION_NAME] AS  SRC_PROMOTION_NAME, PS.[PROMOTION_TYPE] AS SRC_PROMOTION_TYPE,PS.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] AS SRC_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,
PS.[START_DATE] AS SRC_START_DATE,PS.[END_DATE] AS SRC_END_DATE,PD.[PROMOTION_ID] AS TGT_PROMOTION_ID,PD.[PROMOTION_NAME] AS TGT_PROMOTION_NAME,PD.[PROMOTION_TYPE] AS TGT_PROMOTION_TYPE,
PD.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] AS TGT_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,PD.[START_DATE] AS TGT_START_DATE,PD.[END_DATE] AS TGT_END_DATE,
CASE WHEN PD.PROMOTION_ID IS NOT NULL AND PS.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] <> PD.[DISCOUNT_AMOUNT] THEN 'UPDATE' ELSE 'NOVALUE' END AS FLAG_UPDATE,
CASE WHEN PD.PROMOTION_ID IS NULL THEN 'INSERT' ELSE 'NOVALUE' END AS FLAG_INSERT
FROM [hr].[PROMOTION_STG] AS PS
LEFT JOIN [hr].[PROMOTION_DIM] AS PD
ON PS.[PROMOTION_ID] = PD.[PROMOTION_ID]',
source1, source2, source3, source4 union(byName: true)~> union1
